etri.sdn.controller.module.storagemanager

Class StorageConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • etri.sdn.controller.module.storagemanager.StorageConverter

  • public class StorageConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides useful static methods to convert various types of objects to perform I/O operations on persistent storage. Since Aug 11, 2013 Last Modified Aug 20, 2013
    Author:
    SaeHyong Park (labry@etri.re.kr)

    • Method Detail

      • MapToDBObject

        public static com.mongodb.BasicDBObject MapToDBObject(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> map)
        This method converts a Map object into a BasicDBObject, and returns it to the caller. It also substitutes DOT (".") to DOT_STRING ("U+FF04").
        Parameters:
        map - Map object which will be converted into BasicDBObject.
        Returns:
        BasicDBObject BasicDBobject from a given Map object.

      • DBObjectToMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> DBObjectToMap(com.mongodb.BasicDBObject dbObject)
        This method converts a BasicDBObject object into a Map object, and returns it to the caller. It also substitutes DOT_STRING("U+FF04") to DOT(".").
        Parameters:
        dbObject - BasicDBObject which will be converted into Map object.
        Returns:
        The converted Map object from a given BasicDBobject object.

      • toJSON

        public static java.lang.Object toJSON(java.lang.Object obj)
        This method converts an object into a JSON object, and returns it to the caller.
        Parameters:
        obj - An object turns into JSON object.
        Returns:
        The converted JSON object.
